content.metaDescription: Exclusive 4-bedroom luxury villa in Moraira's White Collection. 229m² built, 1018m² plot, 4 min walk to beach. Private pool, contemporary design. €1,795,000
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa MIR0168-3, an exceptional luxury residence nestled in the prestigious Pinar del Advocat area of Moraira. This stunning 4-bedroom, 5-bathroom villa forms part of The White Collection, an exclusive boutique development comprising just four carefully crafted homes, each designed to offer unparalleled privacy and sophistication.

Set on an impressive 1,018m² plot with perfect south-facing orientation, this contemporary Mediterranean villa seamlessly blends modern architectural excellence with traditional Costa Blanca charm. With 229m² of meticulously designed living space, every detail has been conceived to capture the essence of luxurious coastal living, from the expansive terraces and private swimming pool to the thoughtfully landscaped gardens that create your own private oasis just minutes from Moraira's pristine beaches.

locationSection.intro:
Pinar del Advocat represents one of Moraira's most coveted residential areas, offering the perfect balance of tranquil privacy and convenient accessibility. This exclusive enclave sits just a leisurely 4-minute walk from Moraira's stunning beaches and vibrant town center, placing you at the heart of Costa Blanca's most sophisticated coastal community. The location provides easy access to pristine coves, world-class restaurants, boutique shopping, and the charming marina that defines Moraira's elegant character.

The strategic positioning ensures residents enjoy the best of both worlds – the serenity of a private residential setting surrounded by Mediterranean nature, while remaining perfectly connected to all essential amenities. From international schools and premium healthcare facilities to championship golf courses and yacht clubs, everything that defines the luxury Costa Blanca lifestyle is within easy reach, making this location ideal for both permanent residence and holiday home investment.
highlights: 4-minute walk to Moraira's pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters
Walking distance to Moraira's charming town center with premium restaurants and boutiques
Close proximity to prestigious golf courses including Ifach Golf Club
Easy access to international schools and premium healthcare facilities
Excellent connectivity to Alicante Airport (1 hour) and Valencia (1.5 hours)

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa MIR0168-3 showcases contemporary Mediterranean architecture at its finest, with every element designed to maximize comfort, privacy, and the stunning natural surroundings. The south-facing orientation ensures abundant natural light throughout the day, while the open-plan design creates seamless indoor-outdoor living spaces perfect for entertaining and relaxation.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms and 5 elegantly appointed bathrooms
229m² of thoughtfully designed living space across multiple levels
Expansive 1,018m² private plot with mature landscaping
Private swimming pool with integrated outdoor entertainment areas
South-facing orientation ensuring maximum natural light
Open-plan living areas with seamless indoor-outdoor integration
Premium finishes including natural stone details and wooden pergolas
Traditional Mediterranean nayas with characteristic arches
Private parking and secure gated access
Energy-efficient design with modern climate control systems

content.investmentSection:
Moraira continues to strengthen its position as one of Europe's most desirable coastal property markets, with luxury villas consistently demonstrating strong capital appreciation and rental yields. The limited supply of premium properties in prime locations like Pinar del Advocat, combined with growing international demand, creates excellent conditions for long-term investment growth. The White Collection's exclusivity – with only four villas available – adds significant scarcity value that typically translates to superior market performance.

The rental potential for luxury villas in Moraira remains exceptionally strong, with discerning international visitors willing to pay premium rates for authentic Mediterranean experiences in prestigious locations. Properties of this caliber, walking distance to beaches and amenities, consistently achieve high occupancy rates and attractive weekly rental returns, particularly during the extended Mediterranean season from March to November.
whyBuySection: Exclusive boutique development with only 4 villas ensuring ultimate privacy and exclusivity
Prime Moraira location just 4 minutes walk from beaches and town center amenities
Generous 1,018m² private plot – rare to find in central Moraira locations
Contemporary Mediterranean architecture with premium finishes and attention to detail
Strong investment potential in one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious property markets
Perfect south-facing orientation maximizing natural light and outdoor living opportunities
Turnkey luxury property from established developer Miralbo Urbana with proven track record

faqs.question: What is the total price and are there any additional costs?
faqs.answer: The villa is priced at €1,795,000. Additional costs typically include purchase taxes (8-10%), notary fees, legal fees, and registration costs. We recommend budgeting approximately 12-15% of the purchase price for total acquisition costs.

faqs.question: How close is the property to Moraira beach and amenities?
faqs.answer: Villa MIR0168-3 is just a 4-minute walk from Moraira's beautiful beaches and the town center. You'll have easy walking access to restaurants, shops, the marina, and all the amenities that make Moraira such a desirable location.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for non-Spanish residents?
faqs.answer: Non-Spanish residents can freely purchase property in Spain. The process involves making an offer, signing a private purchase contract with a deposit (typically 10%), obtaining an NIE number, arranging financing if needed, and completing at the notary. We guide you through each step.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing for this property?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with Habeno, specialist mortgage brokers who can arrange financing for international buyers. Spanish banks typically offer mortgages up to 70% of the property value for non-residents. Contact us for a pre-approval assessment.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this villa?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Moraira, especially walking distance to the beach, have excellent rental potential. Weekly rental rates for properties of this caliber typically range from €3,000-5,000+ per week during peak season, with strong occupancy rates from March to November.

faqs.question: When will the villa be completed and ready for occupation?
faqs.answer: As part of The White Collection development, completion timeframes depend on the current construction phase. We can provide specific completion dates and construction progress updates upon inquiry. Contact us for the latest project timeline.

faqs.question: What is included in the purchase price?
faqs.answer: The villa comes fully finished with high-quality fixtures, fitted kitchens, bathrooms, air conditioning, private pool, landscaped gardens, and parking. Detailed specifications including appliances and finishes are available upon request.

faqs.question: Can I arrange a viewing of the property?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We can arrange viewings of the development and show you the plans, finishes, and location. For international buyers, we also offer virtual tours and comprehensive video walkthroughs. Contact us via WhatsApp or phone to schedule your visit.

content.conclusion: Villa MIR0168-3 represents a rare opportunity to secure a luxury home in one of Moraira's most exclusive developments. With only four villas in The White Collection, this level of privacy and sophistication in such a prime location won't be available for long. Contact us today via WhatsApp at +34 634 044 970 to arrange your private viewing and discover why this exceptional property could be your perfect Costa Blanca dream home.
